report.title: I Think It's Worth a Try
report.author: Matt
report.bodytext: I was bored one night, and had remembered a friend had told me that he once smoked catnip and got a little buzzed, so I figured what the hell, I'll give it a try. Here's a description of what happened: /n /n 6:00 pm /n I took some ground up and dried 'cosmic catnip' and constructed a pipe out of the tubing of a toilet paper roll and a used up coke can. I took the ground up leaves and lit them up in my pipe, and took a few hits. I see no change as of yet. /n /n 6:05 pm /n Starting to notice a plesant minty feeling in the back of my throat, spreading down to my lungs, otherwise I feel quite normal. /n /n 6:12 pm /n The minty feeling has spread to all of my lungs and appears to be spreading a bit outside of them. I'm starting to notice that reality is taking on a bit of a different look *THIS IS AN EXTREMELY SMALL CHANGE*. It is hard to explain, but when I move my head my eyes do not seem to be in sync with my head's movements, it is like moving a digital camera and the picture does not follow your camera's movements fluidly. /n /n 6:17 pm /n Minty feeling leaves back of throat and is entirely in my lungs, this feeling is very pleasurable. Starting to notice slight muscle weakness. /n /n 6:24 pm /n Feelings of mintyness in lungs still there. Things still same as previous input at 6:17. /n /n 6:48 pm /n Minty feelings decrease a bit, but are still there and feel good. The slight change in reality is still there, although does not seem to be as noticable as before at 6:12 pm. I'm feeling slightly tired. /n /n 6:50 pm /n Eyes feel a bit heavy. Minty feeling in lungs dissapearing very slowly. /n /n 6:55 pm /n Feeling slightly relaxed all over my body. I am now in a chatroom and seem to be typing slower and making more typos more often than usual. /n /n 7:00 pm /n Relaxed and somewhat euphoric feeling increases a bit, but is still very slight. At about this time the lid of a garbage can fell off and startled me, the rush of fear was felt stranger than it would usually feel when I'm startled. It was not a more scary or less scary experience, but it just felt different. /n /n 7:04 pm /n Feeling a slight giddiness, for no apparent reason. /n /n 7:07 pm /n Minty feeling almost completely gone, can feel a bit of it in the bottom of my lungs. I'm in a semi-euphoric relaxed state. Giddiness gone completely. /n /n 7:15 pm /n Relaxed state decreases a bit. Can still feel some of that minty feeling in my lungs. /n /n 7:18 pm /n Relaxed state wearing off. Minty feeling in lungs gone. /n /n 7:30 pm /n Returning back to my normal state. Relaxed state pretty much gone. I am however feeling somewhat sleepy. /n /n 7:50 pm /n The slight buzz I had has worn off, I am completely normal now, no drowsiness at all or anything. /n /n MY CONCLUSION: /n /n Catnip is worth the try if you will be satisfied with a very mild buzz, somewhat similar to marijuana. Do so if you wish, I had a pleasureable experience with it. You should use dried leaves and it should be smoked. Note that I used 'cosmic catnip' which comes in plastic containers with crumbled up leaves. You can buy this stuff at some pet stores.
